Name: Astralojia: Season 1
About the game: Astralojia Season 1 is a slice-of-life fantasy narrative game with a turn-based ATB combat system that uses skill bars and has multiple modes. The story is about Taku, who'll return to his hometown of Raynwood to try again to pass a tough entrance exam to get into a prestigious academy. It starts with him joining his friends Misha and Juno to try to pass the exam. Season 1 includes the first 7 episodes of the series. It's very story-heavy, with only key boss battles, no grinding or leveling up, but instead tougher and tougher battles. The genres are: fantasy, slice-of-life, comedy, magic, and martial arts.
